item.title: Auto-Login [First Script]
item.dc:creator: @Areithe Areithe
item.description:
@Areithe wrote:

Well, heres my first very crappy, very bannable, login script. I was too lazy to try to add any anti-ban features, or anything else that involves making it seem real, but, oh well, what’cha gonna do?

[scar]//------Auto Login------\
//created by: Areithe
//Use with both navigation bar and bookmarks toolbar
//are minimized in Mozilla FireFox
program Login;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
//=====> I don’t know nearly any of the SRL Procedures…
const
username = ‘?’; //Put username between the ‘’, replacing the ?.
password = ‘?’; //Put password between the ‘’, replacing the ?.

procedure click;
begin
clickmouse(468, 484, true);
end;

procedure input;
begin
typesend(username);
wait(2000)
clickmouse(375, 475, true);
wait(3000)
typesend(password);
end;

procedure click2;
begin
clickmouse(313, 521, true);
end;

//Beginning of Main
begin
activateclient;
click;
wait(1000)
input;
wait(1000)
click2;
terminatescript;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
